title: Heroes' Quest/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: (Note: Bring a Summer Pie if boosting Agility for Taverley Dungeon shortcut and an Admiral's Pie if you need to boost Fishing. )

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Heroes' Quest/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Outside the Heroes' Guild; north of Taverley. Speak with Achietties.
Official difficultyExperienced
DescriptionProve you are worthy to enter the Heroes' Guild. To prove your status as a hero you will need to obtain a number of items. There are many challenges standing between you and these items.
Official lengthMedium
Requirements
  • A partner
  • 55 Quest points
  • 53 Cooking (boostable)
  • 53 Fishing (boostable)
  • 25 Herblore (boostable)
  • 50 Mining (boostable)
  • Completion of the following quests:
    • Shield of Arrav
    • Lost City
    • Merlin's Crystal
    • Dragon Slayer I
Items required
  • Ice gloves (obtainable during the quest)
  • Fishing rod (obtainable during the quest)
  • Fishing bait (obtainable during the quest)
  • Dusty key (obtainable during the quest; if travelling to Taverley Dungeon for the lava eel, without 70 Agility) OR a knife or slash weapon (if travelling to the Lava Maze for the lava eel)
  • Harralander potion (unf) (or a harralander and a vial of water)
  • Pickaxe

If you are a Black Arm Gang member (Note: If you are returning to the mansion after the quest to help another player, you do not need the black armour any more):

  • Black full helm
  • Black platebody
  • Black platelegs

If you are a Phoenix Gang member:

  • Some form of Ranged or Magic attack method (if using a Toxic Blowpipe make sure it is set to Longrange)
Recommended
  • 50 Combat level
  • Weapons and armour to kill the Ice Queen
  • Stamina or energy potions
  • Anti-dragon or dragonfire shield to protect against the blue dragons' dragonfire breath
  • Antifire potion to protect against dragonfire breath (Note: Using both the potion and shield fully negates dragonfire damage)
  • Fast travel to several locations
    • Burthorpe (Games Necklace or Burthorpe Games Room grouping teleport)
    • Varrock (Varrock teleport, Chronicle, Ring of Wealth to the Grand Exchange or Combat Bracelet to the Champions' Guild)
    • Brimhaven (Brimhaven teleport, Teleport to House if it is in Brimhaven, charter ship or ship from Ardougne to Brimhaven or Amulet of Glory to Karamja)
Enemies to defeat
  • Ice Queen (level 111) (unless you already have Ice Gloves)
  • Entrana firebird (level 2)
  • Jailer (level 47, optional)
  • Grip (level 22) (for Phoenix Gang members only)
Ironman concerns
The player briefly visits Entrana.
{"requirements":"* A partner\n* <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Quest points\" data-level=\"55\">[[File:Quest point icon.png|21x21px|link=Quest points|alt=Quest points]] 55 [[Quest points]]</span>\n* <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Cooking\" data-level=\"53\">[[File:Cooking icon.png|21x21px|link=Cooking|alt=Cooking]] 53 [[Cooking]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n* <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Fishing\" data-level=\"53\">[[File:Fishing icon.png|21x21px|link=Fishing|alt=Fishing]] 53 [[Fishing]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n* <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Herblore\" data-level=\"25\">[[File:Herblore icon.png|21x21px|link=Herblore|alt=Herblore]] 25 [[Herblore]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n* <span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Mining\" data-level=\"50\">[[File:Mining icon.png|21x21px|link=Mining|alt=Mining]] 50 [[Mining]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">boostable</span>)</sup>\n* Completion of the following quests:\n** [[Shield of Arrav]]\n** [[Lost City]]\n** [[Merlin's Crystal]]\n** [[Dragon Slayer I]]","desc":"Prove you are worthy to enter the Heroes' Guild. Speak with [[Achietties]].","length":"Medium","ironman":"[[File:Ultimate ironman chat badge.png]] The player briefly visits [[Entrana]].","items":"* [[Ice gloves]] (obtainable during the quest)\n* [[Fishing rod]] (obtainable during the quest)\n* [[Fishing bait]] (obtainable during the quest)\n* [[Dusty key]] (obtainable during the quest; if travelling to [[Taverley Dungeon]] for the [[lava eel]], without 70 [[Agility]]) '''OR''' a [[knife]] or [[slash weapon]] (if travelling to the [[Lava Maze]] for the [[lava eel]])\n* [[Harralander potion (unf)]] (or a [[harralander]] and a [[vial of water]])\n* [[Pickaxe]]\n'''If you are a [[Black Arm Gang]] member''' (Note: If you are returning to the mansion after the quest to help another player, you do not need the black armour any more):\n* [[Black full helm]]\n* [[Black platebody]]\n* [[Black platelegs]]\n'''If you are a [[Phoenix Gang]] member:'''\n* Some form of [[Ranged]] or [[Magic]] attack method (if using a [[Toxic Blowpipe]] make sure it is set to Longrange)"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Starting out[edit | edit source]

  • Talk to Achietties outside the Heroes' Guild in Burthorpe. ( 1•4)…
    1I'm a hero, may I apply to join?
    4I'll start looking for all those things then.

Lava eel[edit | edit source]

(Note: Bring a Summer Pie if boosting Agility for Taverley Dungeon shortcut and an Admiral's Pie if you need to boost Fishing. )

Items needed: 1: Vial of water and Harralander or Harralander potion (unf), Fishing Rod, Fishing Bait, Dusty Key

  • Talk to Gerrant, the fishing shop owner in Port Sarim about lava eels. ( 3)…
    3I want to find out how to catch a lava eel.
    He'll give you a bottle of blamish snail slime.
  • Use the blamish snail slime on your harralander potion (unf) to create blamish oil.
  • Buy a fishing rod and some bait if you do not have them.
  • Right-click to use the oil on your fishing rod.
  • Travel to the Taverley Dungeon.
    • You can visit the Wilderness Lava Maze to obtain the eel, but it is advised against due to its location unless you want to also complete the hard Wilderness Diary task.

If you already have a dusty key (steel key ring with dusty key works), or 70 Agility, skip the next step.

  • To obtain a dusty key:
    • Use the map (pictured right) to find Velrak the explorer. He is in the southern part of the dungeon.
    • Kill the Jailer standing by the prison and use the key he drops to get into Velrak's cell.
    • Talk to him for the dusty key. ( 1•1)…
      1So do you know any good places to explore?
      1Yes please!
      Do not ask for a reward.
  • Enter the area with the blue dragons, either by using your key on the locked door or take the agility shortcut.
  • Run to the southernmost lava pool.
  • Catch a lava eel. You only need one, as they cannot be burned. (Catch extra in case you accidentally eat it.)
  • Cook the eel on a range or fire.

Master thieves' armband[edit | edit source]

The next part of this quest requires a companion who belongs to the opposite gang from the Shield of Arrav quest. Please note that characters who have already completed Heroes' Quest can still help friends complete the quest!

*Joining the official Jagex clan chat channel "Osrs Soa" may be beneficial for those who are trying to find a partner in the opposite gang.

Instructions for Black Arm partner Instructions for Phoenix partner
  • Go to south-west Varrock and talk to Katrine in the Black Arm gang headquarters. ( 2)…
    2Is there any way I can get the rank of master thief?
  • Go to Brimhaven, the building directly south of the agility arena entrance.
  • Gang password: Four leaved clover
  • Talk to Trobert. ( 1•1)…
    1So can you help me get Scarface Pete's candlesticks?
    1I volunteer to undertake that mission!
  • Equip your black armour
  • Enter the large mansion in the north-west part of town
  • Talk to Grip. If you have the miscellaneous key in your bank, he won't give you anything. ( 2•3)…
    2So what do my duties involve?
    3Anything I can do now?
  • Go to Varrock and talk to Straven in the Phoenix hideout
  • Gang password: Gherkin
Give the miscellaneous key to your partner Go to Brimhaven, take the miscellaneous key from your partner
Wait for your partner to finish
  • Inside Brimhaven food shop, talk to Alfonse the Waiter about gherkins ( 3)…
    3Do you sell Gherkins?
  • Go through the door, talk to Charlie ( 1•2)…
    1I'm looking for a gherkin...
    2I want to steal Scarface Pete's candlesticks.
  • Enter the secret wall panel by the range, through the yard, into the side door, then use the key on the north door
  • Enter the room north of the entrance and search the cupboard ( 1)…
    1He won't notice me having a quick look.
  • Grip will then come into the room. Close the door behind him
 Wait for your partner to finish
Wait for your partner to finish Kill Grip (with ranged or magic)
  • Take Grip's key
  • Go to the north-west part of the building, use the key on the door
  • Take 2 candlesticks from the chest
 Wait for your partner to finish
  • Give your partner 1 candlestick
  • Take your candlestick back to Katrine to receive the Thieves' armband ( 2)…
    2I have a candlestick now.
  • Trade your partner for a candlestick
  • Take your candlestick back to Straven to receive the Thieves' armband ( 1)…
    1I have a candlestick now.

Fire feather[edit | edit source]

Items Required: Pickaxe (if you do not have ice gloves); Stamina Potions recommended

If you already have the ice gloves, skip the first step.

  • To obtain the ice gloves:
    • Equip combat gear and food to kill a level 111 Ice Queen.
    • Go to White Wolf Mountain. Note: If you need to boost your mining to 50, bring the boost with you.
    • Walk to the northern part of the mountain, mine the rockslide.
    • Take the southern ladder.
    • Follow the tunnel south, go up the ladder.
    • Take the eastern ladder down.
    • Go through the long tunnel.
    • Go up the ladder.
    • Go down the northern ladder. Run north and kill the queen for her gloves.
  • Equip the ice gloves.
  • Travel to Entrana.
  • Kill the Firebird near the Law Altar, take the fire feather.

Finishing up[edit | edit source]

  • Take the feather, eel and armband to Achietties.
  • Quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 3,075 Attack experience
  • 3,075 Defence experience
  • 3,075 Strength experience
  • 3,075 Hitpoints experience
  • 2,075 Ranged experience
  • 2,725 Fishing experience
  • 2,825 Cooking experience
  • 1,575 Woodcutting experience
  • 1,575 Firemaking experience
  • 2,257 Smithing experience
  • 2,575 Mining experience
  • 1,325 Herblore experience
  • Access to the Heroes' Guild
  • The ability to purchase and wield dragon battleaxes and maces
  • Ability to recharge amulets of glory at the Fountain of Rune (This grants 6 charges instead of the usual 4)
  • Ability to use Charge dragonstone jewellery scrolls.
  • Access to the Fountain of Heroes, where players can recharge their amulets of glory

Required for completing[edit | edit source]

  • Throne of Miscellania
  • Legends' Quest
  • Recipe for Disaster
  • The Fremennik Exiles

Items

  • Blamish oil
  • Oily fishing rod
  • Jail key
  • Lava eel (raw)
  • Id papers
  • Miscellaneous key
  • Grip's keyring
  • Pete's candlestick
  • Thieves' armband
  • Ice gloves
  • Fire feather

{{Quick Guide}}

==Details==
{{Quest details page|Heroes' Quest}}

==Walkthrough==
===Starting out===
{{Checklist|
*Talk to [[Achietties]] outside the Heroes' Guild in [[Burthorpe]]. {{Chat option|1I'm a hero, may I apply to join?|4I'll start looking for all those things then.}}
}}
===Lava eel===
''(Note: Bring a Summer Pie if boosting Agility for Taverley Dungeon shortcut and an Admiral's Pie if you need to boost Fishing. )''[[File:Heroes' Quest - Taverley Dungeon route.png|thumb|352x352px]]''Items needed: 1: Vial of water'' and Harralander or Harralander potion (unf), Fishing Rod, Fishing Bait, Dusty Key{{Checklist|
*Talk to [[Gerrant]], the fishing shop owner in [[Port Sarim]] about lava eels. {{Chat option|3I want to find out how to catch a lava eel.}} He'll give you a bottle of [[blamish snail slime]].
*Use the [[blamish snail slime]] on your harralander potion (unf) to create [[blamish oil]].
*Buy a fishing rod and some bait if you do not have them.
*Right-click to '''use''' the oil on your fishing rod.
*Travel to the [[Taverley Dungeon]].
**You ''can ''visit the Wilderness [[Lava Maze]] to obtain the eel, but it is advised against due to its location unless you want to also complete the hard [[Wilderness Diary]] task.
''If you already have a dusty key (steel key ring with dusty key works), or 70 [[Agility]], skip the next step.''
*To obtain a dusty key:
**Use the map (pictured right) to find Velrak the explorer. He is in the southern part of the dungeon.
**Kill the Jailer standing by the prison and use the key he drops to get into Velrak's cell.
**Talk to him for the [[dusty key]]. {{Chat option|1So do you know any good places to explore?|1Yes please!}} '''Do not ask for a reward.'''
*Enter the area with the blue dragons, either by using your key on the locked door or take the [[agility shortcut]].
*Run to the southernmost lava pool.
*Catch a lava eel. You only need one, as they cannot be burned. (Catch extra in case you accidentally eat it.)
*Cook the eel on a range or fire.
}}

===Master thieves' armband===
'''The next part of this quest requires a companion who belongs to the opposite gang from the Shield of Arrav quest. Please note that characters who have already completed Heroes' Quest can still help friends complete the quest!'''

<nowiki>*</nowiki>Joining the official Jagex clan chat channel "Osrs Soa" may be beneficial for those who are trying to find a partner in the opposite gang.

*Go to Brimhaven, the building directly south of the agility arena entrance.
*Gang password: '''Four leaved clover'''
*Talk to Trobert. {{Chat option|1So can you help me get Scarface Pete's candlesticks?|1I volunteer to undertake that mission!}}
*Equip your black armour
*Enter the large mansion in the north-west part of town
*Talk to Grip. If you have the miscellaneous key in your bank, he won't give you anything. {{Chat option|2So what do my duties involve?|3Anything I can do now?}}
|
*Go to Varrock and talk to Straven in the Phoenix hideout
*Gang password: '''Gherkin'''

*Inside Brimhaven food shop, talk to [[Alfonse the Waiter]] about gherkins {{Chat option|3Do you sell Gherkins?}}
*Go through the door, talk to Charlie {{Chat option|1I'm looking for a gherkin...|2I want to steal Scarface Pete's candlesticks.}}
*Enter the secret wall panel by the range, through the yard, into the side door, then use the key on the north door

*Grip will then come into the room. Close the door behind him

*Take Grip's key
*Go to the north-west part of the building, use the key on the door
*Take 2 candlesticks from the chest

*Take your candlestick back to [[Katrine]] to receive the [[Thieves' armband]] {{Chat option|2I have a candlestick now.}}

*Take your candlestick back to [[Straven]] to receive the [[Thieves' armband]] {{Chat option|1I have a candlestick now.}}

===Fire feather===
[[File:Heroes' Quest - Ice Queen's Lair route.png|thumb]]
Items Required: Pickaxe (if you do not have ice gloves); Stamina Potions recommended
{{Checklist|
''If you already have the [[ice gloves]], skip the first step.''
*To obtain the ice gloves:
**Equip combat gear and food to kill a level 111 [[Ice Queen]].
**Go to [[White Wolf Mountain]]. Note: If you need to boost your mining to 50, bring the boost with you.
**Walk to the northern part of the mountain, mine the rockslide.
**Take the southern ladder.
**Follow the tunnel south, go up the ladder.
**Take the eastern ladder down.
**Go through the long tunnel.
**Go up the ladder.
**Go down the northern ladder. Run north and kill the queen for her gloves.
*Equip the [[ice gloves]].
*Travel to [[Entrana]].
*Kill the [[Firebird]] near the [[Law Altar]], take the fire feather.}}

===Finishing up===
{{Checklist|
*Take the feather, eel and armband to [[Achietties]].
*Quest complete!
}}
